title: pATCHING FAILED AND WE'RE NOT SURE WHY.
body:
How to fix. ._.

um. .-.

"Patching failed and we're not sure why, please restart the client to try again. (error code 004)"

 I used **some **stuff from this [website](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)
but not much worked. I looked in my files and I can't seem to find "lolclient_exe" or "lolclient.exe" to restart my client.

Any advice fam squids?{{sticker:sg-janna}} ~ "ITS BEEN 3 DAYS, AND I HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO PLAY."

replies.body:
You mentioned trying "some" of those steps, were you able to finish up the guide? What if the answer was one of the steps you skipped maybe? worth it to finish up for sure!

On top of that, I'd definitely check your permissions to make sure they aren't blocking the patch from going through. 004 Errors typically mean your OS is accidentally blocking access, so it'd be worth doing all the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well.
